text: The 1974 Connecticut gubernatorial election was held on November 5, 1974. Democratic nominee Ella Grasso defeated Republican nominee Robert H. Steele with 58.35% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Ella Grasso, Democratic *Robert H. Steele, Republican Other candidates *Thomas J. Pallone, Independent *Allen C. Peichert, American ===Results=== ==References== 1974 Connecticut Gubernatorial
title: 1974 Connecticut gubernatorial election
